text: Choose a job you love, and you will never have to work a day in your life.
author: Confucius

text: Your work is going to fill a large part of your life. Don’t settle for anything less than what excites you.
author: Steve Jobs

text: Opportunities don’t happen. You create them.
author: Chris Grosser

text: Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to success.
author: Albert Schweitzer

text: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
author: Steve Jobs

text: Hire for attitude, train for skill.
author: Herb Kelleher

text: A company is only as good as the people it keeps.
author: Mary Kay Ash

text: Alone we can do so little; together we can do so much.
author: Helen Keller

text: The right person in the right job will change the world.
author: Anonymous
